name.description: The name of the HDFS service instance.

role.description: The role of the HDFS service instance.

principal.description: The principal for the HDFS service instance.

secret_name.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

cpus.description: The cpu shares used by the HDFS service scheduler.

mem.description: The memory used by the HDFS service scheduler in Mb.

heap.description: The JVM heap used by the HDFS service scheduler in Mb.

api_port.description: The port that the HDFS service API will accept on.

placement_strategy.description: The placement strategy for HDFS nodes. This should always be NODE.

cpus.description: The number of cpu shares allocated to the Name Node process.

mem.description: The amount of memory, in MB, allocated to the Name Node process.

disk.description: The amount of disk, in MB, allocated to the Name Node process.

disk_type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Name Node data. See documentation. [ROOT, MOUNT]

heap.description: The JVM heap used by the Name Node in Mb.

cpus.description: The number of cpu shares allocated to the Journal Node process.

mem.description: The amount of memory, in MB, allocated to the Journal Node process.

disk.description: The amount of disk, in MB, allocated to the Journal Node process.

disk_type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Journal Node data. See documentation. [ROOT, MOUNT]

heap.description: The JVM heap used by the Journal Node in Mb.

count.description: The number of Nodes in the Quorum Journal. This should be either 3 or 5.

cpus.description: The number of cpu shares allocated to the Data Node process.

mem.description: The amount of memory, in MB, allocated to the Data Node process.

disk.description: The amount of disk, in MB, allocated to the Data Node process.

disk_type.description: Disk type to be used for storing Data Node data. See documentation. [ROOT, MOUNT]

heap.description: The JVM heap used by the Data Node in Mb.

count.description: The number of Data Nodes in the cluster

executor.description: The HDFS service executor configuration object.

cpus.description: The cpu shares used by the HDFS service executor.

mem.description: The memory used by the HDFS service executor in Mb.

heap.description: The JVM heap used by the HDFS service executor in Mb.

disk.description: The amount of disk used by the HDFS service executor in Mb.

name_node_rpc_port.description: The RPC port for HDFS Name Nodes.

name_node_http_port.description: The HTTP port for HDFS Name Nodes.

journal_node_rpc_port.description: The RPC port used by Journal Nodes.

journal_node_http_port.description: The HTTP port used by Journal Nodes.

data_node_rpc_port.description: The RPC port used by Data Nodes.

data_node_http_port.description: The HTTP port used by Data Nodes.

data_node_ipc_port.description: The IPS port used by Data Nodes.

permissions_enabled.description: If true, permissions checking is enabled

name_node_heartbeat_recheck_interval.description: This time decides the interval to check for expired datanodes.

compress_image.description: If true, the File System image will be compressed.

image_compression_codec.description: The image compression codec for the File System image.
